page.title: 12SOCIAL LIFE IN CROSTON
page.content: {Sports Club}bar is open nightly and mainly used by older men.{18-25s}visit {pubs}most often and some middle aged and older men. {Bar snacks}at lunchtime are popular with middle aged and retired, at least once a month,other groups sometimes. Some older people eat regularly in {Restaurants}but mainly family groups celebrating special occasions.Eating out determined by{income.} Occassionally church or other groups hold{special functions}such as harvest supper or barbecue. Some entertain{at home}for drinks or meals about once a month. {14-18yr olds}meet in groups near a phone box,outside fish and chip shop or in one another's houses.A few go to Eccleston or Wigan{disco}by bike as there are no night buses. Youth Club and Guides run{some discos.
